synopsis.text: Many years have passed since Nozomi Yumehara and her friends fulfilled their duties as Pretty Cures, protecting the Palmier Kingdom and the hopes of others. Now adults, they are busy building careers and relationships. Nozomi has become a middle school teacher, working to support her students' dreams. When a new threat emerges with the power to manipulate time, Nozomi and her friends are called to action once more. Mysterious flowers bloom in the Cure Rose Garden, granting the Cures temporary youth to transform and combat the sinister plans. Though the carefree days of their youth have long passed, their desire to protect the hopes of others remains strong. Embarking on a new saga, the Cures must learn to balance adult responsibilities with their duties, overcoming new obstacles and finding strength in each other. Though much has changed, their friendship and determination is as powerful as ever. This sequel celebrates the 20th anniversary of Pretty Cure, showing the characters grown up but still dedicated to fighting for dreams and hope.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
